it.polimi.se2018.view

Interface ControllerActionsInterface

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    App, CLIApp, CLIAppTest.CLIAppMock, ClientControllerTest.AppMock, CommandAcceptInviteTest.FakeApp, CommandAddDieTest.FakeApp, CommandAutoCompleteTest.FakeApp, CommandChangeLayerTest.FakeApp, CommandChangeLayerTest.FakeApp2, CommandCreateInviteTest.FakeApp, CommandLeaveMatchTest.FakeApp, CommandLogoutTest.FakeApp, CommandPassTurnTest.FakeApp, CommandRefreshLobbyTest.FakeApp, CommandShowCardsTest.FakeApp, CommandShowConnectedUsersTest.FakeApp, CommandShowFavoursTest.FakeApp, CommandShowGridTest.FakeApp, CommandShowInvitesTest.FakeApp, CommandShowLeaderBoardTest.FakeApp, CommandShowReserveTest.FakeApp, CommandShowRoundTrackerTest.FakeApp, CommandUseToolTest.FakeApp, JavaFXApp, ServerMessageHandlerImplTest.AppMock

    public interface ControllerActionsInterface
    Interface for Controller-View communication
    Author:
    Mathyas Giudici

             int player2,
             int player3)

        Parameters:
        matchIdentifier - contains the MatchIdentifier of the match just ended
        player0 - contains the points of first player
        player1 - contains the points of second player
        player2 - contains the points of third player
        player3 - contains the points of fourth player
